mean_en: used to describe something that is done without energy or enthusiasm because of habit or because it is expected
sentence: His perfunctory attempt at lunch was some moldy bean sprouts from the back of the fridge.
sentence_trans: 他想拿冰箱里发霉的豆芽来草率解决午餐。
word_etyma: per假、坏+funct活动+ory…的→没起好作用的→perfunctory草率的
